comments:
I20051116-1332

Attempting content assist in the variables view results in the following 
exception. The javadoc for #getInvocationContext() specs that null can be 
returned, so I will file this bug against JDT-Text. Not sure if the debugger 
needs to play catch up here.

Dup of bug 116304. CompletionProposalCollector must come up with an
InvocationContext if there is none set from the outside.
